Chapter1: ^You are awoken by a sudden searing sensation of pain, combined with a guttural high-pitched scream. It takes you a second or two to realise that the scream is emanating from your own mouth.

^The agony starts in your head before swiftly travelling South, coursing through your upper body, winding around your behind before travelling down your left leg. When it reaches your left foot, it finally stops. You weakly open your tired eyes and groan.
^TUTORIAL: In this story, you will earn and lose Affection Points with both your captor and the other captives.
^“Oh…oh god! Wh-what the hell was that? What happened? And…”
^“…just how much did I drink last night?”
^“…why the hell am I wearing a school uniform?!”

c-0: ^“…where the fuck am I?!” you ask aloud.

^In answer, the old CRT TV in the centre of the room springs to life, turning itself on. The image displayed on the screen is distorted and grainy…the sound of equally poor quality as well. Yet you can just about make out the image of someone wearing a sinister looking sad clown mask.
^Due to their padded costume and the hunched way they are sat, it is impossible to say for sure whether they are male, female, or somewhere between.
^Discordant classical music is playing in the background. The clown looks at you and sighs.
^“Watch your language, young lady! That’s no way to speak to your dear Principal A.B Lee.”

^Still holding you, Brick sits down on the sofa. You cling to his muscular body. Relishing feeling safe in his arms…no matter how fleeting such a sense of safety may be.

^Taking your hand in his, he leads you to the sofa. You sit side by side, clinging to each other. Resting your head over his chest, you listen to his heart beating faster as the minutes go by.
